name: City Police Sim: Car Traffic
description:
City Police Sim: Car Traffic is the best police driving game as the user will have to perform multiple police car driving challenges. Get ready to fight the real gangster in the Miami city of crime police games. The user will have to perform various robber chase tasks.
Realistic Open world city environment.
Ultra High Definition (HD) Display.
Chase Supersonic fast cars.
Accurate physics in the drive.
Ultra-sensitive controls with sensitivity meter.
Smooth and easy drive options.
Efficient Game-play without any lagging.
